name: Survive the dark (itch) (NBFemboy)
description:
BEFORE YOU PLAY

1. Game is made in CLickteam fusion 2.5 so Windows Defender (defult anti virus) WILL mark this app as a virus no matter what i do.

2. there is a file that explanes most of the things so read it before you play

3. "Original" is 64x64 and "XxY" will be the same as window when pressed so you won't have to wear glasses like me

"Survive the Dark" is a game that i made for "64x64 game jam", i planed on making this game ...welp not like this but beacuse of my poor programing skill i had to change it and becasue of that it's a bit more like a "Five night a freddy" game. 

In it you need to survive (at least for now) 3 nights of monster attacks and as night progres it gets a bit harder (monsters spawns faster) and you also have stats like stamina that you need for runing BUT there are items that are here to help you survive like coffe that will increas your movment speed and stamina regen for a short time (you will get them after some time)

Right now game is just a prototyp so i can see if that idea is good, and i am planing on realasing one balance update (or more if needed) and then i will go back to my vacation from my IT school and after vacations are over i will work from scratch on that project (because of plan changes it's a bit spageti code "-w-) 

So after playing pleas let me know what i should change and leave other ideas like: new monsters , new mechanics , new items etc. 

Have FUN
